thread.title: Here's What We Know About Schoolboy Q's Pink 'Girl Power' Hoodie
thread.title_full: Here's What We Know About Schoolboy Q's Pink 'Girl Power' Hoodie | Complex

author: Joshua Espinoza
title: Here's What We Know About Schoolboy Q's Pink 'Girl Power' Hoodie
text:
Here's What We Know About Schoolboy Q's Pink 'Girl Power' Hoodie By Joshua Espinoza Find him on Twitter . 
Feb 14, 2017 Share Tweet Image via Getty/Christopher Polk As the saying goes: Not all heroes wear capes. Sometimes they rock neck-snapping hoodies with a subtle, yet powerful, message about gender equality.
Before the 2017 Grammy Awards kicked off, Schoolboy Q stepped on the red carpet accompanied by his young daughter Joy, who immediately caught photographers‚Äô eyes with her bright pink Gucci suit; however, what made this moment especially beautiful was Schoolboy‚Äôs decision to wear a matching pink hooded sweatshirt with the words ‚ÄúGirl Power‚Äù emblazoned on the front and back.
The hoodie was one of the most-talked about looks of the night, with many people asking where they could cop the piece.
I need that pink girl power hoodie schoolboy q had on
‚Äî Intelligencer Lupin (@WULFGOD) February 13, 2017 Well, it turns out they can‚Äôt. The hoodie was a one-of-a-kind design by Schoolboy‚Äôs stylist Dianne Garcia .
  Hoodie is 100% custom for Q down to the Pantone of the tie dye to match Joy so not for sale üôÖüèª. #dadgoals üì∏: @retone 
A post shared by Dianne Garcia (@dianne) on Feb 13, 2017 at 1:45pm PST
Related Watch ScHoolboy Q and Joey Badass Battle in an Intense Game of Trampoline Dodgeball Watch Kendrick Lamar, Schoolboy Q, ASAP Rocky, and More Perform at TDE's 2016 Holiday Concert ScHoolboy Q Teases a New Album in 2017 "I actually customized the hoodie,‚Äù Garcia told Complex. ‚ÄúIt's sewn, tie dyed, and embroidered just for Q."
Schoolboy, who was nominated for this year‚Äôs Best Rap Album ( Blank Face LP ) and Best Rap Performance ( ‚ÄúThat Part‚Äù featuring Kanye West ), explained why he chose to wear the piece.
‚ÄúI see a lot of stuff going on with women these days and I'm here to support them,‚Äù he told the Los Angeles Times . ‚ÄúI could go out and protest and all that, but me having a little girl, I think it starts right here‚Äîto let her know what's going on, how she needs to be treated and the respect she needs to be given."
It was a great move by the TDE artist, who is currently working on his fifth studio album . During an interview with Zane Lowe earlier this month, Schoolboy dished on the upcoming project, which he says will focus on his role as a dad.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs moreso my life after I made it to the point of Schoolboy Q. I gave you me, but I never gave you the other side of me: the father, the dude that‚Äôs actually happy, the dude that doesn‚Äôt be in the hood just hanging out," he said . The dude that‚Äôs trying to put his homies in position now. I‚Äôm not a deadbeat father anymore.‚Äù
Tags: News , Grammys , Schoolboy Q , Hoodie
